ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.controllers

Class UserListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.controllers.UserListController

  • public class UserListController
extends java.lang.Object
    When making edits to the User List model it should be done through this UserListController class.
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserListController()
      Constructor just sets the userList to the only UserList that exists in the app (UserList is a Singleton).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUser(User user)
      Adds the User passed as a parameter to the UserList and then sorts the list based on most recent users

      Adds a view that the UserList is on.
